(July 12, 1968 Ọgọst 9, 2021) bụ onye America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ hip hop na R&B.
Thompson bụ ónyé otu Bad Boy Entertainment's "Hitmen" team of in-house productions n'oge 1990s, ma soro Bad Boy mogul Sean Combs rụọ ọrụ na ihe màkà ndị na-ese ihe dịka The Notorious B.I.G
Ihe ndị o mepụtara gụnyere Mary J
Blige's My Life, The Notorious B.I.G.'s Ready to Die na Faith Evans's Faith
A mụrụ Thompson na Washington, D.C
Ọ nwụrụ n'ihi nsogbu COVID-19 n'ụlọ ọgwụ dị na Los Angeles, California, na Ọgọst 9, 2021.
